emotional_root_cause: emotional control whether it need to be in control or you feel controlled. it stems from feeling out of control, powerlessness and resentment
physical_root_cause: Migraines and headaches are often caused by abnormal dilation and constriction of blood vessels in the brain, along with inflammation of surrounding nerves and chemical imbalances like serotonin fluctuations.
healing_tips: This pain is showing you a great deal of anger that you have been suppressing so communicate how you feel and express your boundaries in a way that is heard and respected. Self observation and reflection

physical_root_cause: Chronic fatigue is linked to mitochondrial dysfunction, hormonal imbalance (especially cortisol), low-grade inflammation, and impaired energy production at the cellular level.

emotional_root_cause: deep resentment, stubbornness causing overthinking and high cortisol
physical_root_cause: Insomnia commonly results from dysregulation of the circadian rhythm, high cortisol levels, overactivation of the nervous system, and imbalances in neurotransmitters like melatonin and GABA
